LandingPage.HeaderText: Introducing new Crisco® Olive Oil—the authentic taste you love, from a name you trust. Available in three flavorful varieties—100% Extra Virgin, Pure, and Light — Crisco Olive Oil is a cholesterol free food.

Category.Name: 100% Extra Virgin OLIVE OIL
Category.Description: Use the full-bodied flavor of Crisco 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil to add a robust taste to salad dressings or as a marinade for meats and poultry.

Category.Name: PURE OLIVE OIL
Category.Description: Mild, with just a hint of fruity flavor, Crisco Pure Olive Oil works well in sautés and stir-fries.

Category.Name: LIGHT OLIVE OIL
Category.Description: Use the full-bodied flavor of Crisco 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil to add a robust taste to salad dressings or as a marinade for meats and poultry.
